name: Tombs of Merimda
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam 54! Got totally distracted for most of the week on the procedual generation and fixing bugs that I missed out on A LOT of content I wanted to included. Also taught me not to spend time on art if I haven't developed that part of the game yet :'(

Controls

Arrows and Enter in Menus

Arrows/WASD and Z/Space in gameplay

How to Play

Enter a randomly created dungeon and try to get as high a score as possible
